trans-unit.source: Copy & Continue to Microsoft

trans-unit.note: The [{0}]({0}) will be a url and the {1} will be a code, e.g. 123456 {Locked="[{0}]({0})"}

trans-unit.source: Open settings
Reload

To finish authenticating, navigate to Microsoft and paste in the above one-time code.
Yes

trans-unit.note: The {0} will be a code, e.g. 123-456

trans-unit.source: A custom Microsoft Sovereign Cloud
Azure China
Azure US Government
Microsoft Account
Microsoft authentication provider
Sign In
Sign Out
The Active Directory endpoint for the custom Sovereign Cloud.
The Active Directory resource ID for the custom Sovereign Cloud.
The Sovereign Cloud to use for authentication. If you select `custom`, you must also set the `#microsoft-sovereign-cloud.customEnvironment#` setting.
trans-unit.note: {Locked='`#microsoft-sovereign-cloud.customEnvironment#`'} The `#microsoft-sovereign-cloud.customEnvironment#` syntax will turn into a link. Do not translate it.

trans-unit.source: The authentication implementation to use for signing in with a Microsoft account.

The custom configuration for the Sovereign Cloud to use with the Microsoft Sovereign Cloud authentication provider. This along with setting `#microsoft-sovereign-cloud.environment#` to `custom` is required to use this feature.
trans-unit.note: {Locked='`#microsoft-sovereign-cloud.environment#`'} The `#microsoft-sovereign-cloud.environment#` syntax will turn into a link. Do not translate it.

trans-unit.source: The management endpoint for the custom Sovereign Cloud.
The name of the custom Sovereign Cloud.
The portal URL for the custom Sovereign Cloud.
The resource manager endpoint for the custom Sovereign Cloud.
Use the Microsoft Authentication Library (MSAL) to sign in with a Microsoft account using a browser. This is useful if you are having issues with the native broker.
Use the Microsoft Authentication Library (MSAL) to sign in with a Microsoft account.
